name: Lemegeton
skill: Increases DMG taken by all enemies by 31%/37% for a limited time.
ability: Skill attacks have a moderate chance of inflicting Stun.
All melee allies absorb a portion of DMG dealt as HP.

additional_data.description: The spirit of five combined magic books on angels and demons. Each of the five books is incredibly powerful, so since becoming a spirit, she has a kept them in separate locations. She can use the power of any of the books, but each book has a will of its own, so it's more like she asks them to lend her their power. Controlling the power is difficult, and if she mishandles it, the angels and demons come together and start fighting, and all chaos breaks loose.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Trade at Exchange for 75 Mochi 28/02/17 - 30/04/17
◦ The cost increases by 25 Mochi after each exchange
(75, 100, 125, 150, 175)

skill: "Grant me a taste of the power to control this magic!"
summon: "If you have any questions about angels or demons come to me."
limit_break: "Someday I will rein them all in..."
